TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StylusPointsReplacedEventHandler(object sender, StylusPointsReplacedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StylusPointsReplacedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusPointsReplacedEventArgs"> that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPointsReplaced"> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
